business.headline: Should you be paying rent with credit card?More and more people are using credit cards to pay rent. But does the benefit of extra days to pay and cashback outweigh the fees and credit score impact? Let's break it down.
Sensex ends 572 points lower, Nifty below 24,700; Kotak Bank down 7%The S&P BSE Sensex lost 572.07 points to end at 80,891.02, while the NSE Nifty50 was down by 156.10 points to close at 24,680.90.

5 IPOs worth Rs 7,000 crore to open for bidding this week. Check detailsThis week, five mainboard IPOs are opening for bidding: NSDL (National Securities Depository), M&B Engineering, Sri Lotus Developers & Realty, Aditya Infotech, and Laxmi India Finance.

Can opting for old regime help you save tax in FY25?Many believe that under the new tax regime, there is no tax on income up to Rs 12 lakh. However, this change will only take effect from April 1, 2025, and will apply to returns filed for the FY26.

Edelweiss' Radhika Gupta slams Dior for ignoring Indian artisans behind $200K coatThe luxury brand Dior showcased a $200K coat adorned with traditional Lucknowi 'mukaish' embroidery. While 12 Indian artisans spent 34 days crafting it, their names, and India's contribution, went unacknowledged.

Is TCS cutting jobs because of AI? Here's what CEO K Krithivasan saysTCS CEO K Krithivasan said that the company is still looking for highly skilled professionals, especially those who can support TCS's plans to expand into new technologies and markets.

What homeowners need to know about house property tax rules, explains tax advisorBuying a home comes with more than just EMIs and maintenance; it brings tax implications too. Sujit Bangar, Founder of TaaxBuddy.com, breaks down the key rules every homeowner should be aware of to avoid surprises during filing season.

New Income Tax Bill 2025: 3 key changes that could make ITR filing easierThe committee submitted its report to Parliament on 21 July. It's over 4,500 pages long and includes 285 suggestions to improve the draft New Income Tax Bill, 2025, which is meant to replace the old 1961 Act.
Have you got your BluSmart refund yet? It's been 90 daysBluSmart wallet refund: As July comes to an end, users say they have not received their money back and are struggling to even access the app.

Explained: Why Kotak Mahindra Bank share price fell over 6% todayThe decline came after the private lender posted a weaker-than-expected set of results for the April–June quarter. The stock decline comes in the wake of a 7% year-on-year drop in standalone net profit to Rs 3,282 crore, even though the bank reported steady growth in core lending activity.

Sensex opens over 300 points lower, Nifty below 24,800; Kotak Bank down 4%The S&P BSE Sensex was down by 225.28 points to 81,237.81, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 43.60 points to 24,793.40 as of 9:30 am.

Samsung to power Tesla's future with $16.5 billion chip deal: ReportThis long-term contract comes at a crucial time for Samsung. While the company is one of the world's biggest makers of memory chips, its foundry business, which produces chips for other companies, has struggled to keep up with demand and competition.

entertainment.headline: Mahesh Bhatt says Alia is self-made, calls Ranbir laid-back: She is a go-getterVeteran producer-director Mahesh Bhatt recently called his daughter Alia Bhatt a self-made actor. Apart from Alia, he also shared his views on why son-in-law Ranbir Kapoor is a laid-back actor.

Parmeet Sethi recalls marital struggles with Archana Puran Singh: It was very tenseActor Parmeet Sethi opened up about his personal and marital struggles. He credited the Art of Living course for helping him find emotional peace during tough times with his wife Archana Puran Singh.

John Abraham hugs fan imitating Allu Arjun's Pushpa Raj, video goes viralJohn Abraham recently met a fan dressed as Pushpa Raj from Allu Arjun's film 'Pushpa'. The actor was so impressed by his act that he hugged him, and the video quickly went viral.

Hari Hara Veera Mallu poor VFX edited: Fans wonder why wasn't it done earlierActor Pawan Kalyan's epic-action-drama 'Hari Hara Veera Mallu: Part 1—Sword vs Spirit' was re-released in theatres with trimmed scenes and enhanced VFX. The changes caught the attention of movie-goers who questioned why it wasn't done earlier.

Mallika Sherawat sets record straight, says not doing Bigg Boss 19 and never willActor Mallika Sherawat confirmed on Monday that she will not be joining 'Bigg Boss 19'. She addressed rumours on her Instagram story, stating that she will never be seen on the show.

Rupali Ganguly seeks blessings from Lord Shiva at Mahakaleshwar temple, shares pics Rupali Ganguly visited the Mahakaleshwar temple in Ujjain with her husband to seek Lord Shiva's blessings on Sawan Somvar. The 'Anupamaa' star shared pictures from the spiritual visit, which are now going viral on social media.

Kaantha teaser: Dulquer Salmaan revives golden age cinema in tense period dramaThe teaser of 'Kaantha', starring Dulquer Salmaan and released on his birthday, offers a glimpse into a gripping 1950s Madras tale of artistic rivalry and ego clashes. The film will release in September.

Saiyaara hits global top 50 on Spotify - Krish dreamt it, the world played itSpoiler ahead! Krish Kapoor (played by Ahaan Panday) vows to make the 'Saiyaara' song so big that it reaches his love, Vaani Batra (Aneet Padda). It seems like fiction has become reality as the song has shot to the No. 1 spot on Spotify's Top 50 India and climbed to No. 4 on the Global Top 50 list.

Beyonce ends Cowboy Carter tour on historic note in Vegas. WatchSinger Beyonce brought the curtain down on her historic Cowboy Carter tour with a final performance in Las Vegas, featuring unexpected moments and special guest appearances.

Island actor Cha Eun-woo becomes real-life Jinu with Arden Cho in Free tributeK-pop stars Cha Eun-woo and Arden Cho embody Jinu and Rumi in an emotional 'KPop Demon Hunters' cover of 'Free'. The 'True Beauty' actor has enlisted himself for 2025 military service.

Farah introduced domestic nepotism with cook Dilip, says influencer. Director reactsInfluencer Freddy Birdy applauded filmmaker Farah Khan for her vlog series featuring her cook Dilip. He stated that Khan is promoting a new kind of "domestic nepotism". She responded to the praise in the comment section of the post.

Anirudh Ravichander's Chennai concert postponed to August 23 at a new venueComposer Anirudh Ravichander's concert was scheduled to take place on July 26 in Chennai, but was postponed one week before its scheduled date. The new concert date and venue have been listed on District app, although an official announcement is awaited.

Actors Jessica Alba-Danny Ramirez confirm romance with steamy kiss. Pics go viralHollywood actor Jessica Alba has seemingly confirmed her relationship with actor Danny Ramirez after they were seen sharing a passionate kiss outside his Los Angeles home. Pictures and videos of the duo have surfaced on X and Instagram.

Jennifer Lopez jokes about wardrobe malfunction, says she doesn't wear underwearJennifer Lopez shrugs off a major wardrobe malfunction during her concert, tossing aside her skirt and commanding the stage like the seasoned professional she is. Fans respond with enthusiasm.

Rohman Shawl celebrates 7 years of love and quiet friendship with Sushmita SenActor Rohman Shawl penned an emotional tribute to his relationship with Sushmita Sen, marking seven years since their journey began. In a heartfelt Instagram post, he reflected on how their bond transformed from romance to a 'quiet friendship'.

Big B shares Rs 20 Sholay ticket from 1975, thinks that's the cost of soft drink nowAmitabh Bachchan continued his Sunday tradition of meeting fans and shared reflections on creativity, excess, and nostalgia on his blog. He also shared a rare Rs 20 'Sholay' ticket from 1975, ahead of the film's 50th anniversary this August.

Elli AvrRam on Ashish Chanchalani's wouldn't date her remark: We share that banterActor Elli AvrRam addressed dating rumours with 'Chandaniya' co-star and influencer Ashish Chanchalani. She also addressed the backlash received by the influencer for saying he would never date her.

Washington Black review: A well-crafted show on racism, dreamers and scienceRelease Date:Wed Jul 23, 2025Washington Black series review: 'Washington Black' based on Esi Edugyan's novel of the same name, is available for streaming in India on JioHotstar. Is the drama-series worth your time? Here's our review.

Rana Daggubati, Vijay Sethupathi ideal to play Hiranyakashyap: Director Ashwin KumarDirector Ashwin Kumar, who recently helmed the mystical animation film 'Mahavatar Narsimha' opened up on which Indian actor, according to him, could play the demon king Hiranyakashyap. He also emphasised the need for an indigenous animation revolution in Indian storytelling.

general news.headline: No PM-Trump call between April 22–June 17: S Jaishankar rejects mediation claimsS Jaishankar said that several countries contacted India on May 10, informing that Pakistan was ready for a ceasefire. The External Affairs Minister stated that India made it clear to all countries that it would only consider ceasefire talks from Pakistan if they came through the Director General of Military Operations channel.

Pahalgam attack mastermind was caught napping - Inside details of Op MahadevOperation Mahadev was the result of a 14-day-long pursuit and involved coordinated action by the Army, CRPF, and J&K Police, with efforts still ongoing to identify the terrorists and track down their remaining associates.

I miss you, mummy: Nimisha Priya's daughter seeks mercy in Yemen death row caseKerala nurse Nimisha Priya's thirteen-year-old Mishel travelled to Yemen with her father and a peace envoy to plead authorities for her mother's release. In the video, she can be seen telling, 'I love you, mummy, I miss you.'

Live: 7 Op Sindoor delegations made India proud abroad, says S JaishankarParliament Session 2025 Live Updates: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh initiated the discussion on Operation Sindoor in the Lok Sabha, saying India's military operation was not stopped under any pressure, dismissing repeated claims by US President Donald Trump that he brokered a ceasefire between the nuclear-armed neighbours. He underlined that armed forces halted their strikes on Pakistan as the objectives had been fully achieved. Congress MP Gaurav Gogoi led the Opposition's charge, questioning Singh did not detail how the terrorists entered Baisaran Valley in Jammu and Kashmir's Pahalgam and killed 26 people. External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar hit back at the Opposition, saying its MPs were "hyphenating themselves" and ensured TRF, the group behind Pahalgam attack, was declared a terror group by the US. Follow indiatoday.in for live updates.

Why Mahadev Hill of Kashmir, a living legend, is sacred to HindusSecurity forces killed three terrorists involved in the April 22 Pahalgam terror attack, near Kashmir's Mahadev Hill. They were killed in Operation Mahadev. The peak is a sacred site which finds mentions in ancient scriptures and Kashmiri folklore. This is the story of Mahadev Peak, whose ice was once sold in Srinagar.
Trump says Putin has 10 or 12 days to agree to Ukraine peace deal or face sanctionsDonald Trump says Putin has '10 or 12 days' to agree to Ukraine peace deal or face sanctions

56-inch chest shrinks to 36 inches before Trump: Trinamool MP jabs PM in ParliamentThe attack was a direct jab at the Prime Minister with reference to Trump's constant claims that he indeed brokered the ceasefire between India and Pakistan after days of military hostilities between the two countries.
Siddaramaiah's survival trickA favourable Supreme Court verdict caps a good run for the beleaguered Karnataka chief minister

Caught on CCTV: Hyderabad man, 25, dies after he collapsed while playing badmintonA 25-year-old man from Hyderabad's Khammam collapsed while playing shuttle. He was rushed to the hospital but declared dead on arrival. He worked for a private company in the city.

Pahalgam attack mastermind among 3 terrorists killed in Op Mahadev: Sources Live UpdatesTop Lashkar commander Suleiman Shah, alias Hashim Musa, was the conspirator and executor of the Pahalgam attack, which left 26 civilians dead.

AI reason behind TCS laying off 12000 employees? CEO comments suggest yes and noThe message is loud and clear: quickly adapt to new technologies, will be critical for survival in the evolving industry. It is, as it has always been, all about survival of the fittest.
Divya Deshmukh creates history, beats Koneru Humpy to win Women's World Cup 2025Divya Deshmukh created history as she defeated Koneru Humpy to win the Women's World Cup 2025 crown on Monday, July 28.

Flyer shouts Allahu Akbar, makes bomb threat on UK flight to send Trump a messageAn easyJet flight from London to Glasgow was forced to make an emergency landing after a passenger shouted "Allahu Akbar" and claimed he had a bomb. He said he wanted to "send a message" to Donald Trump, who was at his Turnberry golf course in Scotland at the time of the incident. The flyer has now been arrested and faces charges.

RJD MLA's Panchayat-style threat gets Bihar Sachiv's 'not scared of you' responseAn audio clip, allegedly featuring RJD MLA Bhai Virendra, has gone viral, in which he is heard threatening a panchayat secretary who failed to recognise him during a call about a death certificate request.

Who was Hashim Musa, Pahalgam mastermind killed while napping in J&K?Suleiman Shah alias Hashim Musa, a former Pakistani special forces soldier and top Lashkar-e-Taiba commander behind the brutal Pahalgam tourist killings, was eliminated during Operation Mahadev while napping in his Dachigam hideout.

Indian football team to get new head coach on August 1, Jamil front-runnerThe AIFF executive committee will announce the new Indian men's football head coach on August 1. Khalid Jamil emerges as the frontrunner amid financial challenges and competition from experienced candidates.

Bengaluru women claim they were followed by group of men, record video from autoIn a video recap of the incident, the women described how the day began with a visit to Bengaluru's Rameswaram Cafe. As they later walked near JP Nagar, they noticed that some men, whom they had seen earlier at the cafe, appeared to be following them.

Did sex-abuser Epstein introduce Melania to Trump? Musk-stoked fire spreadsUS President Donald Trump's biographer, Michael Wolff, has claimed that Jeffrey Epstein helped introduce Melania Trump to the former. This adds a new twist to the controversy sparked by Elon Musk's allegation that Trump appeared in the Epstein files. While Melania has refuted the allegations, Musk's claims have seemingly become a new political threat for Trump.
Gadgets: Foldable, unforgettableA new smartphone that survives fall, the sun, rough handling, and looks great while doing it

Crochet 'forever' flowers are in and they're handmade with loveYou don't have to worry about that flower from your special someone wilting any more, as crochet 'forever' flowers are blooming everywhere, and they're here to stay.

Karnataka professor faces inquiry as girl students allege hijab forced during tripAn Assistant Professor at the Central University of Karnataka allegedly compelled female students to wear the hijab during a university field trip, triggering a formal complaint and internal investigation.

Kerala nuns arrested in Chhattisgarh for alleged conversion, Rahul Gandhi slams BJPTwo Catholic nuns from Kerala were arrested in Chhattisgarh over alleged conversion charges, sparking political outrage. Rahul Gandhi and Kerala Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan demanded their release, calling it persecution of minorities under BJP rule.

Op Sindoor roka kyun?: Rahul Gandhi questions Rajnath Singh in Lok SabhaLeader of Opposition in Lok Sabha Rahul Gandhi interjected Union Defence Minister Rajnath Singh when he was responding to why India stopped Operation Sindoor against Pakistan.

BJP vs BJP turns Constitution Club election into a thrillerA club election in the heart of New Delhi has turned into a BJP vs BJP thriller. After 25 years of uncontested reign as Secretary of the Constitution Club of India, BJP MP Rajiv Pratap Rudy is facing a surprise challenge from fellow party leader and former MP Sanjeev Balyan. The battle for the key post at the elite MPs' club has split loyalties across caste, region, and even party lines.

Tanishk Bagchi denies Saiyaara track being copiedTanishk Bagchi denies allegations of copying tunes for 'Saiyaara' from One Direction and Jubin Nautiyal. The original Hindi track's global chart success challenges his image as just a recreation composer.

Hina Khan shares funny video with mother-in-law on shaadi ke side effectsActor Hina Khan shared a light-hearted video showcasing her relationship with her mother-in-law on Instagram. She playfully mentioned in the caption that the video is about the side effects of marriage.

Mahesh Bhatt says Alia is self-made, calls Ranbir laid-back: She is a go-getterVeteran producer-director Mahesh Bhatt recently called his daughter Alia Bhatt a self-made actor. Apart from Alia, he also shared his views on why son-in-law Ranbir Kapoor is a laid-back actor.

Parmeet Sethi recalls marital struggles with Archana Puran Singh: It was very tenseActor Parmeet Sethi opened up about his personal and marital struggles. He credited the Art of Living course for helping him find emotional peace during tough times with his wife Archana Puran Singh.

sports.headline: Archer should not play Oval Test, Gus Atkinson can replace him: Stuart BroadEngland vs India: Stuart Broad has called for caution over Jofra Archer's workload, urging England not to risk the injury-prone pacer in the fifth and final Test against India at the Kia Oval.

Shubman Gill picks best knock from historic England series: Most pleasing to meShubman Gill rates his Manchester Test hundred as his best knock in the England series. His innings helped India secure a crucial draw and matched a historic Bradman record.

Watch: Divya Deshmukh in tears, hugs mother after Chess World Cup winDivya Deshmukh, 19, won the Women's World Cup 2025 title by defeating veteran Koneru Humpy in a dramatic tie-break. Divya also achieved the Grandmaster title after becoming the first Indian to win the crown.

Indian football team to get new head coach on August 1, Jamil front-runnerThe AIFF executive committee will announce the new Indian men's football head coach on August 1. Khalid Jamil emerges as the frontrunner amid financial challenges and competition from experienced candidates.

Rishabh Pant provides update on foot injury, to begin rehab soonIndia vice-captain Rishabh Pant has thanked fans for their support and confirmed that he will begin rehabilitation once the fracture in his right foot heals.
Divya Deshmukh creates history, beats Koneru Humpy to win Women's World Cup 2025Divya Deshmukh created history as she defeated Koneru Humpy to win the Women's World Cup 2025 crown on Monday, July 28.

Should India push Jasprit Bumrah to play 5th Test vs England?India vs England: Jasprit Bumrah has already played his promised 3 Tests in England. Should he push for one more with the series on the line?

Indian Legends applaud resilient India fightback in Manchester Test drawIndia's remarkable fightback at Old Trafford has kept the five-match Test series alive. With standout performances from KL Rahul, Shubman Gill, Ravindra Jadeja, and Washington Sundar, the team displayed exceptional resilience, drawing praise from cricketing legends ahead of the series decider.
ENG vs IND: England add all-rounder to squad for Oval Test against IndiaEngland announced their squad for the Oval Test and decided to add Jamie Overton to the side for the upcoming clash.

You expect him to take 10 wickets? Kapil Dev defends Anshul Kamboj after debutKapil Dev has jumped to the defence of young pacer Anshul Kamboj after his lacklustre debut in the Manchester Test for India. Kamboj failed to make a mark in his first match in India colours.

Want a hundred against Brook? Of course! Ashwin slams Stokes for 4th Test fiascoR Ashwin slammed Ben Stokes and England for the fiasco they created by trying to end the Manchester Test early and deny Ravindra Jadeja and Washington Sundar hundreds on Sunday, July 27.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
